channel.title: Website banner
channel.description:
The main color of the banner would be gold The main text 'Blitz Revolution' ?sub text? -skilling, -PVM, -spawning make it somewhat like near reality's but only gold(not just a recolor tho)
i'm not sure if it's allowed but here the site with the banner you need to replace http://blitzrevolution.byethost33.com/forum/ (the banner says urban right on it)
